page.title: Jobs & Internships
page.intro: Join the fight at the GPCFB to eradicate hunger in the Pittsburgh area and beyond lorem ipsum.

excerpt.short: Responsible for warehouse product care including receiving, storage, distribution, pickup and/or delivery.
Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.

Provide support to facilitate Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank member network development and provide information, referrals, and food assistance to families within our eleven-county service area.
If you would like to apply for a position, you may email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418
